languages.text: Флот Ксавьера Калькасара загнал на мир династии фон Валанциус остатки друкарского рейда и изничтожает его с орбиты, громя планету.
A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.
languages.original_text: Флот Ксавьера Калькасара загнал на мир династии фон Валанциус остатки друкарского рейда и изничтожает его с орбиты, громя планету.

languages.text: Une flotte appartenant à Xavier Calcazar a pourchassé les survivants d'un raid drukhari jusqu'a un monde des von Valancius et pilonne actuellement la planète pour les anéantir.
languages.original_text: A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.

traits.locale_text: Une flotte appartenant à Xavier Calcazar a pourchassé les survivants d'un raid drukhari jusqu'a un monde des von Valancius et pilonne actuellement la planète pour les anéantir.

languages.text: ザビエル・カルカサル率いる艦隊が、フォン・ヴァランシウス惑星に向かうデュカーリ襲撃の残党を追っており、軌道上から星を破壊している。
languages.original_text: A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.

traits.locale_text: ザビエル・カルカサル率いる艦隊が、フォン・ヴァランシウス惑星に向かうデュカーリ襲撃の残党を追っており、軌道上から星を破壊している。

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎的舰队追逐着残存的黑暗灵族掠夺者，来到了冯·瓦兰修斯世界。他们对行星轨道上的敌人穷追猛打，对行星造成了重创。
languages.original_text: A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎的舰队追逐着残存的黑暗灵族掠夺者，来到了冯·瓦兰修斯世界。他们对行星轨道上的敌人穷追猛打，对行星造成了重创。

languages.text: Una flota perteneciente a Xavier Calcazar ha perseguido a los restos de una incursión Drukhari al mundo de von Valancius y está aniquilándolos desde la órbita, bombardeando el planeta.
languages.original_text: A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.

traits.locale_text: Una flota perteneciente a Xavier Calcazar ha perseguido a los restos de una incursión Drukhari al mundo de von Valancius y está aniquilándolos desde la órbita, bombardeando el planeta.

languages.text: Eine Flotte von Xavier Calcazar hat die Überreste eines Drukhari-Überfalltrupps auf die Welt der Dynastie von Valancius verfolgt. Sie attackieren die Drukhari vom Orbit aus, was auch den Planeten in Mitleidenschaft zieht.
languages.original_text: A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.

traits.locale_text: Eine Flotte von Xavier Calcazar hat die Überreste eines Drukhari-Überfalltrupps auf die Welt der Dynastie von Valancius verfolgt. Sie attackieren die Drukhari vom Orbit aus, was auch den Planeten in Mitleidenschaft zieht.

languages.text: Xavier Calcazar'a ait bir filo, Drukhari baskınından geriye kalanları von Valancius hanedanlığına ait bir dünyaya kadar kovalamış ve yörüngeden yaptığı atışlarla bunları yok etmeye çalışıyor.
languages.original_text: A fleet belonging to Xavier Calcazar has chased the remnants of a Drukhari raid to the von Valancius world and is presently obliterating it from orbit, battering the planet.
